<Text: Trimble Township Community Forest:  Formerly called Taylor Ridge, it was purchased in 2006 from the Sunday Creek Coal Company, and was formerly part of the Sunday Creek State Wildlife Area.>
Triplets:<Trimble Township Community Forest

<Text: Trimble Township Community Forest:  The AOA negotiated with the Trimble Township Trustees on its use before purchase.>

--------------------
Text: Trimble Township Community Forest:  It is located in Athens County, Ohio, south of Ohio State Route 78, between Glouster, Ohio and Murray City, Ohio.
